mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_COMMENT_TBL VALUES( SEQ_REVIEW_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{reviewNo}, #{commentContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
